author: strawmanbeater
title: Re: Media note that violence in Sweden happened days after Trumpâ€™s comments; so what caused these riots?
text:
Just days after his comments! Those rioters did an admirable job restraining themselves before torching those cars. @IngrahamAngle @CNNPolitics @POTUS Unbelievably cynical. The Fake News knows exactly what it's doing. 
â€” ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Jasper Coolidge (@jaspercoolidge) February 22, 2017 @IngrahamAngle @CNNPolitics @POTUS Trump barely mentioned Sweden at that rally but anyone following real news knew what he was referring to. 
â€” Lisa Forsberg-Ley (@lisaforsbergley) February 22, 2017 @IngrahamAngle @ChuckBlair20 @CNNPolitics @POTUS should have read "Trump predicted riots would happen in Sweden, he was right again" ğŸ˜‰ğŸ‘ #MAGA 
â€” â¤ï¸Proud Americanâ¤ï¸ (@LovesAmerica1) February 22, 2017 @IngrahamAngle @CNNPolitics @POTUS Now President Trumps has the power to start riots. Maybe he can magically eradicate ISIS? 
â€” Doug Mordecai (@dougmordecai) February 22, 2017 
It was a while back now, but certainly someone in the media can check Google to see what Trump was up to in 2013 when â€œyouthâ€ in Sweden rioted for a week in an area populated largely by immigrants from Turkey, the Middle East, and Somalia. 
Coincidentally, those riots followed the killing of a Muslim man who reportedly attacked police with a machete, a bit like this weekâ€™s riot followed an arrest in the area by Swedish police; best not to jump to conclusions, though. 
After some investigation, news outlets like the New York Times and the Guardian reported that the 2013 riots were supposedly sparked by â€œlong-term youth unemployment.â€ Many immigrants from Muslim countries seem dissatisfied with the Swedish welfare state: http://t.co/Ik0RX9FfDC 
â€” Jeffrey Goldberg (@JeffreyGoldberg) May 27, 2013 
Itâ€™s been years now â€” could someone please contact the Swedish Embassy during their non-trolling hours and tell them to just create some jobs already?
